36648528.review:
[h1] Социальная реклама. [/h1]

Где то далеко-далеко в глубинах библиотеки Steam, есть особенная категория игр. Они там живут, размножаются и ждут своего времени. И рано или поздно, этот момент наступает и игру запускает застенчивый школьник, и сразе же получает тумаков от родителей. Не запускайте игры 18+, если вы не достигли этого возраста.

[code][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/] Еще больше обзоров на кураторской страничке Dreams of Genesis! Подписывайтесь, с нами весело!	[/url][/code]

На самом деле игр эротического характера в steam довольно много, конечно для того что бы попасть в магазин они проходят цензуру. Но зачастую разработчик оставляет патчик, который снимает закрытые сценки и который найти в сети не составит труда. Я не говорю вам этого делать, просто что б вы имели ввиду.
[h1] 
- Ваше королевство в руинах! Ваших сестер похитили! Что вы будете делать? 
- Тра***ся!	[/h1]

Злые силы окружили мирное и славное королевство. Вот вроде как все окей и через секунду монстры наполнили королевский замок, избили всех стражей и всячески подпортили интерьер. Все это произошло настолько стремительно, что Мэлтис даже не успела понять что произошло. Кто она такая и почему так внезапно вклинилась в рассказ? Ну как бы объяснить, она одна четырех принцесс королевства и отличительной её чертой являются ну уж очень большая грудь, возможно даже излишне большая. При осаде королевского замка её трех сестер похищают, само строение разносят по кирпичикам, а все что может король, так это развести руками и улыбнутся улыбкой тупицы. Поэтому придется брать справедливость в свои руки и идти разребать навоз (я б сказал по другому, но цензура стим такая… цензурна).

В осном же это классическая jrpg построенная на RPGMaker, двигаем персонажа по карте заходим в города, в городах в дома, а в домах разговариваем или лупасим нпс, или же наоборот, они нас лупят, а иногда после этого еще и тр***т. Я ж уже говорил что игра 18+? Так же геймплей завязан на крафте, потому собирательство приветствуется. Кстати концовок в игре порядка шести, так что реиграбельность даже после первого прохождения есть.

Игра обладает довольно приятной рисовкой кат-сцен в анимешно-хентайном стиле, однако это распространяется только на персонажей с сиськами. В лучших традициях жанра, мужские персонажы отрисованы на порядок скромнее.

[h1] Салфетки в набор не входят.	[/h1]

Так что  если вы являетесь ценителем JRPG, хотите немножко эротики и придерживаетесь возрастного рейтинга 18+, то игра определенно вам зайдет на ура, ведь игра действительно имеет достойный уровень исполнения.

先是国际惯例，我，柰子，给钱。
然后，一个黄油，最核心的是什么？我个人的观点是黄的部分——其他的都不是核心竞争力。我对本游的评价是，在核心竞争力方面，以rpgmaker为基础制作的黄油来说，质量上乘，立绘良心，内容丰富而没有明显的毒点，同时在其他次要方面（剧情，系统设定等等）也达到或超出了平均水准。一句话总结的话，值得花钱购买，而不是看过全cg就-1。
当然，不可否认的是，对国人中日式黄油的玩家群体来说，本游没有汉化版，对于社保程度是有相当的负面影响的。以鄙人的游戏经历来说，由于英文版游戏的翻译相当“美式”，或者说，在词汇上很接近美国口语，因此如果没有一定的美式英语基础，仅仅是依靠翻译软件来玩的话，可能难以得到理想的游戏体验。个人建议，如果真的日文和英文都不擅长的话，可以直接去用机翻翻译日文，然后参考日文原文来加以理解，这样可能效果会好一些——日文苦手的鄙人就是这么照着日版攻略通关的。

This game wil throw confusing boners. Be warned of the bait. Hence not for the morally weak.

This game will play with sexuality on all playing sides. Not for the morally strict.

36165933.review:
Meltys Quest is the latest HRPG by Happy Life (in collaboration with Remtairy), brought to the English speaking fanbase thanks to Remtairy.

The first thing to note about this game is that, unlike the latest HRPGs releases from other publishers on Steam, this one offers a pretty good English translation (which keeps getting tweaked and fixed to correct some typos/grammar), constant updates to fix all the issues pointed out by users and a free and complete uncensor patch (i.e. no mosaic) downloadable from [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/meltys-quest-15008521]Remtairy's patreon page[/url].

The CGs in the game are pretty well drawn and the naughty situations cover a wide range of fetishes, some managed better than other. Meltys is quite the charming lady, look wise and, in my opinion, personality wise. She's not the sharpest but she's got a nice heart and that's what I love about her.

The combat is turn based and is shown in a first person style, with just the enemies on screen. The way to learn skills by accruing experience fighting with a specific dress until the dress skill gets unlocked is interesting and gives the dresses another use other than just to unlock some sex scenes or complete some quests.

Last in comes a consideration about the price of this release. Compared to other games of this kind on Steam, this game is pricey. We've got used to 2-4€ affairs while this one came out with a 19,99€ price tag. This is because this game launched on Steam concurrently with its Japanese release and because it offers a true English localization instead of a stream of gibberish.
With that in mind, the 20€ price makes sense and I think it's more than worthwhile for what is offered here. Add to it the great launch discount bringing the price down to 11,99€, the level of support shown from day 1, a free uncensoring patch which even removes mosaic and I can do nothing else but recommend it wholeheartedly to anyone who's interested in these type of games.

So first things first:  This game is a blast. 
Light hearted, over-sexualized and fun. Whatever your strange hentai fetish might be, I guess you'll find something to suit your palate. 
The GC is really nicely done (I do recommend a uncensoring patch though if you dont like huge black censor bars), the music as okay-ish as to be expected from a RPG Maker game. Easy on the ears but wholly forgettable and you'll be fine if you don't play it without any score alltogether. 
Personally I would have liked a bit more voice acting/accompainment in the H scenes but what's in it suits just fine. Harmless and forgettable though; just like the rest of the score and sounds used. 

What I really like are the gathering/crafting elements, which are implemented pretty clumsily but which are also overall pretty fitting in a game which, on normal difficulty, isn't set out to challenge you in any way - some of you folks might want to start with the higher difficulty option right from the start. Everything in this game is solely for entertainment purposes, be it the prostitution side quests, the bland but somehow addicting resource gathering or the sometimes hilarious "plot" strings with one of the most potty mouthed princesses you'll ever come across. 

If you want to relax, have a good laugh or just like to ogle hentai CG, just pop in good ol' Meltys. It is worth your time if you're in any way into H games.

36135847.review:
Meltys Quest is a rather fun, cute adventure that is, most importantly, quite sexy.

Even if it feels like I'm about 1/4 through the game already, I can really only comment on the art. It's internally consistent, but more importantly, it's really damn good. It's not your standard anime art style, but something a bit more different and in the right ways. Whoever drew the art for this game KNOWS how to do expressions really damn well, and it adds alot to the characters, but specifically Meltys (yes that is her literal ingame name. No I dunno why, it's super dumb, but It's grown on me. MY headcanon is that her parents were high when naming her and accidentally added the s at the end. Then again, the s is at the end, probly due to the trope of the mystical fantasy name).

The store page indicates that Meltys is a princess who must go on an adventure to save her familys kingdom, however what it doesn't tell you, is that she has an outrageous mouth on her, is massively lazy to the point of ignoring her fathers summons, aka, the kings summons in favor of a nap after some mad-heavy tanning, and likes to swear and talk big.
Alot.

So she's basically me in real life, only female, extremely hot, and a bit more lazy, also when saving an entire kingdom single-handedly from stupidly-horny monster men is placed upon her shoulders, she doesn't shut down, but becomes excessively determined.

This game is indeed an RPGMaker game, but unlike most others, this game is entirely a single character game. You will meet other characters, but you will only ever control Meltys, which is why She is constantly on the screen (beyond being able to admire her in one of literally over twenty costumes I believe) as when cutscene dialog happens, characters appear on the other side and grey out when not speaking on either side.

The art is just.. completely fantastic. But I will nitpick as a fellow artist. The loincloths are literally just wierd condoms. Literally. Every. Single. Loincloth. Is wrapped around the "length" of any monster that has one, either it looks wierd and just silly, or it looks like it's a diaper instead, it's just bizarre, and sort of takes you out of the game just a bit. I get that it's a censoring tactic, but irregardless it bugs me alot honestly. But beyond that, the quality of the art, and alot of the character designs just look great.

And ofcourse it wouldn't be Meltys Quest, or an RPGMaker game without action-y anime tropes that show before you even start on your quest, what with a butler character who shouts out special move names before actually doing them in a cutscene.

However, the cutscenes in the more simple way they're usually done, are still just completely fantastic. While it is just wiggling sprites around in the right ways, the movements are nicely done, and the effects are well-used. It's the best sprite wiggling I've seen yet, but I don't play RPGMaker games usually.

The music is great. Not too catchy, but not too boring that you'll quickly get tired of it, especially the battle and boss themes. Although after grinding quite a bit, I've gotten the victory tune stuck in my head, alongside the adorable graphic or Meltys cute, happy face when that displays at the bottom when you win any fight. Almost like the idea of finding loot off dead monster corpses excites her.

Though, boss-wise, some of them make little sense. The first dungeon boss is a normal human-like nurse chick. The third is a lamia. These don't make much sense, since Lamia are literally fairly decent-level demons, and the monster she resides over, are all just lizardmen with diapers and straight swords. Sure, the colors of both are pretty similar, but it still doesn't make too much sense. As for the first dungeon, all you face are goblins, so that for SURE makes little sense.

However, I really like how the first time you start a dungeon, you have to either evade every monster (which is fucking DIFFICULT by the way), or fight every single one while having gotten strong enough to handle them all and also challenge the boss of the dungeon, which only really spans one-four screens (as far as I know) ofcourse ignoring screens only accessible after the boss dies.
I say this because once you fight one monster and kill it, the exit is blocked off, and you must then kill the boss to even retreat, or, lose one fight, which you can do instantly via the "Give Up" option. Once you lose a battle, you're kicked out of the dungeon to the world map.

And ofcourse, once you lose a battle, you're treated with a lewd cutscene of the boss enjoying Meltys defeated body. Ofcourse it's censored (and it can be removed, just look to the pinned forum thread) but it's still just as nice honestly. Ofcourse I got the uncensor patch, because lewditity, or sexuality should never hide from prying eyes, but rather display all it has proudly, not caring who judges.

Which is when I will say, I love this game. It's sexy, cute, adorable, and every part of it is just... so. damn. GOOD.

Well-worth the asking price if you ask me, the translation of this is also top-notch. The "dev" of this version of this Eroge (Imagine that's jsut a way of saying "Lewd RPGMaker game" or just "Lewd RPG") is merely the one who translated it to English. They have a patreon, and while they don't give any real rewards, I'd pitch in a dollar.

People like this, need to be supported. I want more of this shit in my life dammit!

So, better yet, just buy this game. It's good, and you can skip lewd scenes and all cutscenes by holding Control. I believe the left one only. But more importantly, the gameplay is kind of addicting and really interesting, costumes eventually give you a single skill, but these skills are really good in the right situations, and item hoarding is VERY limited, which I adore completely.

Best of all: Death in this game, is not Game Over. That is.. if you WANT to do a trasitional RPG run of this game, you CAN treat the H-scenes as Game Overs.

36133431.review:
This game is...incredible. I have played many H-games, on Steam and off, VNs and momre, and I have to say, this game is absolutely AMAZING. Outside of several occasional game-freezing bugs (which are actively being fixed, judging by the updates), it's a smooth experience all the way through, and, on Kogal mode (which I just finished my first playthrough with), it's a speedy and easy experience. Let's face it, if you're getting this game, you're getting the H-patch, and if you're getting all that, it's definitely not for the gameplay.

The best comparison I could think of for this game is the famed Queen Opala trilogy, which is a similar RPGMaker H-game experience, though a little cruder and more on the extreme side. In my opinion, this game is superior in every way. The art style is more consistent and the gameplay is smoother. While the depth of gameplay and world, and the length of the game is less, Meltys provides far more compact and convenient fun. Again, that's what we're looking for in this kind of game, right?

Looking at Meltys as a standalone game (with H-patch, of course), it's a fun choose-your-own-adventure ero book hidden behind some casual grinding and RPGMaker assets. The controls are extremely simple and easy to adapt to, the battles are quick and amusing, and everything just feels crisp and effiicient, which is often difficult to say about RPGMaker titles. 

The crispest thing, though, is the art. If you don't have the uncensor patch yet, get it RIGHT now https://www.patreon.com/posts/meltys-quest-15008521 and enjoy. This game has, by far, some of the best art I've ever seen, and while that's usually a matter of opinion, I'm comparing this to other incredible games like NekoPara and Princess Evangile. In sheer amount of art and scenes, variety of fetishes catered to, and general pacing, this game takes the absolute cake. I would probably pay $20 JUST for this sheer load of art by itself. The writing, translated from Japanese, is peppered with minor errors and could generally use some work, but I hardly found myself reading most of the time, if you get my drift.

I've rambled on long enough. In summary, if you are an H-game lover like me, or want to explore the world of H-games, or simply are looking for another interesting outlet for a special kind of desire, GET THIS GAME. Between the quality of the art and the effort that went in to making Meltys Quest a smooth, finished project, I hope it goes down in history as one of the best English H-games of our time.

36096242.review:
Meltys Quest is the first H-game I've ever bothered to pay for, after numerous disappointments in the past with sub-standard quality work.

I have yet to finish the game, but in my three hours played, Meltys' Quest has taken her far and wide. There is passable RPG-style progression and combat in the game, with turn-based combat, enemy weaknesses, leveling, and equipment you can buy of various kinds. You can gather various outfits throughout the game for Melty to wear, each with a passive benefit you get while wearing it during combat, and a unique skill that can be unlocked by using the outfit in enough battles (which can be then used with or without the outfit equipped).

The story is fairly generic, and stereotypical, but I don't think that any of us are really here for the story. If anything, the stereotypical nature of it all (Princess of a kingdom goes to try and save her kingdom from the monsters!) makes it quite enjoyable. You spend the game going throughout your kingdom, and later on the monster kingdom, fighting various monsters and bosses. There's a good variety here.

Most of us are here for the sex, however. In that regard, this game delivers quite well. There are two ways to get to "sex scenes" in this game. The first way is either to lose a battle against monsters, or to "give up," against them. In that case, a unique scene depending on the monster (or boss) you are fighting plays out, and they are all very well drawn. The second way is by doing various "jobs" within the game, which progress in their own manner. Melty has a "sl*t level" as well that is tied to the various acts she performs, and as this increases, the outfits you can wear as well as the strength of certain attacks you can perform increases over time. In this way, losing battles is a legitimate way to play the game - I myself lose quite a few on purpose just to see the scenes!

I will have to warn everyone however - the scenes cater to just about every taste out there. Certain types of sexual fetishes are not my thing, and yet some of them might surprise you out of nowhere. Still, you can always just proceed through such scenes until you find the art that you actually wanted in other scenes.

It isn't a very long game (I believe I'm probably about halfway through, from the looks of things), but it has been enjoyable enough that I can recommend it. More H-games need this level of polish put in. The art, music, and overall gameplay experience is quite enjoyable. The english translation as well - while often filled with grammatical issues and typos - is also very often hilarious and filled with colloquialisms that make it all quite enjoyable to read.

36090270.review:
God bless Japan.


I'm very happy that a game like this was actually released on Steam, as I'm a huge fan of H-games both Western and from Japanese devs. I apologize in advance but this review will not exactly talk about Meltys Quest in specific. I will say this though: The game is good, a bit difficult at the start and slightly grindy (but not too bad), but it's a lot better than your typical H-game RPG. The H-scenes are also very tame and well-made. Good writing/translations with very, very minor errors, and the plot is alright and nothing too special (you might like the story, you might not, whatever).

I truly and honestly hope this marks the beginning of an era where the Western video game market finally gets rid of this mentality where "guns, blood, and killing are perfectly fine, but if a nipple gets shown anywhere in the game, then it's the end of the world." I'm not saying to make the reverse be true either: video games are video games, you play them for fun, and I believe that violence and sexual themes should both be allowed equally. I also hope Japan will eventually rewrite/repeal their archaic censorship laws so that H-games can be seen in a light that's accessible to everyone, as censorship turns off a lot of people, but that's maybe asking for too much.

We've been pretty tame about the whole "sexual themes are not okay, but guns and violence are" thing as of late, but most people who feel the same way I do can feel this stigma where we're still very reluctant to start marketing these kinds of games so openly. The fact that a game as raunchy as this - Nekopara has very "vanilla" and "reserved" H-scenes compared to the ones in this game where you literally w.hore yourself out and get dicked on by monsters - is available on a platform as popular on Steam is a huge achievement, and could definitely be a sign of change, a good change.

If you share the same hopes and dreams that I do of seeing more H-games in the Western market, please support the devs by buying this game, and support other Western/Japanese H-game devs by buying their games on dlsite, itch.io, or supporting them on patreon, etc. This sends a message to Japanese H-game devs that says "Hey, there's a market for this kind of thing over here too and we welcome it!" Voting with your wallet can make all the difference.

*edit 11/22/2017*: heavy changes to wording in the review, and I have also nominated this game for the Steam Awards 2017 for the Write-In category, with the category name being "Redefining Social/Cultural Norms". Bit of a long shot, but I didn't have any other nominations in mind for a game-category pairing other than joining in on the "Better Battlefront 2" meme.

36022358.review:
At the moment, this is the best porn game released on Steam.
Yes, there are better games with sex-scenes, but as far as something completely focused on being masturbation material goes? Meltys Quest is the best right now.

Combat is... alright, I guess. You can either strategize, or just brute-force the entire game. If you opt for latter, grinding really doesn't take any time at all.
The plot is light, and never really takes itself seriously. Even when the stakes are raised at points, you never really feel that there is much of a risk. This'd be a problem, if the game wasn't using the story just as setting for sex-scenes.
Art is also pretty nice, but might be a mixed bag to some people. For the record, all the characters are varying degrees of busty, there's no "normal breasts" or anything smaller here.
Getting different scenes is also pretty simple affair, though I wish each of the costumes you can unlock had at least one unique scene. But the volume currently available is pretty impressive.

So yeah, it is good. Compared to other RPG Maker porn games available, this is significantly more expensive, but what you're getting is actually competent release and translation, rather than barely functional machine-crap.
The game is pricy, though. I had no problem buying it on launch discount at 12 euros, but 20€ is kind of a lot. I'd say 15 would be sweet spot as far as pricing goes.

35989293.review:
Meltys Quest有下列幾個優點：
1. 無碼
2. 黑肉
3. 不是機翻
4. 紙娃娃系統
5. 精美的畫面與H事件

嗯！你沒看錯！
是無碼喔！
這遊戲居然無碼！
移植到Steam上的日本HG居然能無碼，這實在是大開我的眼界啊！
[strike]而且無碼patch是官方提供的，去討論區找置頂文就有。[/strike]
由於steam最近的政策，遊戲官方不能主動提供無碼patch了，不過討論區還是有好心玩家提供無碼patch的連結，或者是自行去官方的英文網站找也有。

撇開無碼不談，Meltys Quest本身畫面品質非常不錯，遊戲系統也算有趣，缺點就是沒有中文，但是英文翻譯的品質還不錯。

至於商店頁面提到的日文語音，以我目前玩到的進度來說，平常對話是沒有語音的，而H場景的語音只有女主角的呼吸聲與呻吟聲，女主角並沒有講話，不過至少可以聽出是日本人配的。

順便一提
Meltys Quest的日文名字叫做メルティス・クエスト
拿去丟google可以找到它的DLsite頁面
以及名叫sachinama點com的官方網站
裡面有這個遊戲的完整攻略

另外，遊戲資料夾內的Read Me有教學如何啟動Steam Overlay
遊戲預設是關閉的，所以不能按F12截圖
啟動Steam Overlay的方法如下：
1. 收藏庫對著遊戲名稱按右鍵選擇內容
2. 點選「一般」裡面的「設定啟動選項」
3. 輸入「--in-process-gpu」(沒有上下引號)
之後就能在遊戲中按F12截圖了
但是官方有說不保證跑起來沒問題，有問題的話只能放棄了
我自己的情況是玩了4小時都沒發生問題就是了

總之這是值得購買的好遊戲，非常推薦！

剧情：女主晚上和姐姐们通宵研究哲学，白天某小国突然被恶魔入侵，国王召集三个姐姐商讨如何对敌→她们的妹妹睡觉中；（游戏预览图中女主坐在沙发上向执事表示入侵什么的不关我事hhh）紧接着恶魔入侵，执事大爷英勇的砍倒了所有想攻击国王的杂鱼。但一个从DARK SIDE突然出现 被黑框遮住了巨R和下体 的粉毛恶魔，两巴掌打飞了执事和黑皮并抓走了她三个姐姐；国王和这个叫Meltys的黑皮公主带着执事大爷仓皇跑路谋划复国大计（当然过程并不悲伤甚至我还想笑），剧情充满了HH，令人愉快的内容。女主的首要目标是找到姐姐们，其次是打倒恶魔光复首都，黑皮大姐姐你国都亡了还不忘亲情，真是令人动容

简单介绍：本游戏有6种结局，8—14小时的游戏时间，基本CG数量72张，CG总量上百，图片总量过千。
十分简单惬意的RPG游戏，集合了战败/西瓜肚/换装养成/经营（重建城堡）/调教敌人/FUTA/爆衣系统；拥有极其优秀的画质和丰富的游戏内容。
可控制三名不同的女主（DL上的意思应该是控制换装和战斗），技能和战斗方式也完全不同，不同的魔物等着玩家去攻略。游戏内存在解锁全部CG的地下室。
女主存在堕落值，越高女主属性越强（去主动被侵犯吧），还会解锁更多事件，在H经验变多后事件CG会发生变化（良心公司）；多达21种的服装各有不同事件，服装有怀孕身形；走在街上时，用你的鼠标点女主不同的部位吧。
FUTA可以啪敌军的女BOSS。一旦被高级恶魔附身，女主就会改变自己的行为，主动出击♂。
游戏存在多结局，打出圣女结局后可以把女主变白皮，二周目就可以自行选择肤色了。

难度：
普通难度，可在BOSS战前恢复状态，地牢（或者说地下城）随处是出口，适合那些用下体玩游戏的玩家。
困难难度：BOSS战前恢复受限，BOSS被击败前离开迷宫会变得更难（相较普通），适合那些享受挑战和冒险的玩家。请走两步一存档

【完全攻略】メルティス・クエスト (Happy Life) 【徹底公式】
https://sachinama.com/archives/875 

最后，这游戏没汉化，但我给95分。

按F4全屏游戏。 在本游戏中steam默认关闭，如果需要启用steam功能，需要在启动选项中输入 -in-process-gpu 以便在游戏中也可以使用steam截图，一旦游戏崩溃，说明玩家的电脑并不支持此举，请于启动选项删除-in-process-gpu。
